name: Dino Escape (Abnormal)
description:
Play as little dino trying to escape the quantum bridge factory. Run and collect quantum fruits in order to survive the journey out. But be aware, each fruit only has one use, so use them at you own peril. Will you take shortcuts? Or will you make it through on your own merit?

Controls-

A,D - Move Left and Right
W- Jump
Space- Use Fruit

Credits

Coding - Myself
Player Art- Dino Characters by ARKS
Platforming Art - Pixel Adventure by Pixel Frog
Music - BaconWiz
Sound Effects- Leshy SFX Maker
